Description:
[smoke]Can not insert a data item in Grid Element

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20061222 Eclipse 3.3-M4 jdk1.5

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a report
2, Insert a Grid element
3, Insert a dataitem in Grid element

Expected result:
Data item can be inserted successfully

Actual result:
Error occurs and the layout block
